article:
When I was seven, my mother gave me a small bag to keep my money in. I was  _ and I put it happily in my schoolbag.
One day, I found my money bag was lost. All my money was in the bag. If I couldn't find it, I could buy _ . I looked for it everywhere but couldn't find it. I was very sad. It was not only because of the money. I was afraid that my parents _ be angry  with me. I kept thinking about how I lost my bag and _ my parents would say to me. After school, I got on the school bus. Luckily, I didn't have no to pay for the bus. My parents _ paid for it on the first day of every month.
When I got home, I told my mother what _ She was very angry and gave me a long lecture  . When my father came home and heard about my story, he just
 _ He told me not to worry and he would buy me _ small bag. I appreciated   my father and I kept my money more _ from then on.
